courses.title: Mastering the Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of piano playing, from scales to simple songs, in a structured and engaging way.

courses.title: Guitar Essentials: Acoustic and Electric
courses.description: A comprehensive course covering chords, strumming, and beginner solos on acoustic and electric guitars.

courses.title: Singing Mastery: Find Your Voice
courses.description: Enhance your vocal range, pitch, and tone with professional singing techniques and exercises.

courses.title: Music Theory 101: The Building Blocks of Music
courses.description: Understand the basics of music theory, including scales, chords, and rhythm, to enhance your music skills.

courses.title: Drumming for Everyone: Basics and Beyond
courses.description: Learn how to play drums like a pro, from basic beats to advanced drumming techniques.

courses.title: Violin Basics: From Strings to Symphony
courses.description: Start your violin journey with this beginner-friendly course and learn how to play simple tunes.

courses.title: Digital Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Create your own music with professional tools and techniques using Ableton Live software.

courses.title: Ukulele for Beginners
courses.description: Master the basics of ukulele playing and learn popular songs in no time.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation: Unlock Your Creativity
courses.description: Explore the art of jazz improvisation and learn to create your own solos with ease.

courses.title: Sound Engineering and Mixing
courses.description: A deep dive into sound engineering, mixing techniques, and audio equipment for aspiring producers.
